fields.label: Message
fields.placeholder: Tell us more about your moving needs...

faq.question: What areas do you serve?
faq.answer: We serve all of Orange County and surrounding areas including Los Angeles, Riverside, and San Bernardino counties. Our main service areas include Anaheim, Irvine, Santa Ana, Newport Beach, Huntington Beach, and more.

faq.question: How far in advance should I book my move?
faq.answer: We recommend booking at least 2-3 weeks in advance for residential moves and 4-6 weeks for commercial moves. However, we can accommodate last-minute moves based on availability.

faq.question: Do you provide packing materials?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer a full range of packing materials including boxes, tape, bubble wrap, and specialty items. You can purchase these separately or as part of our packing service.

faq.question: Are you licensed and insured?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We are fully licensed, bonded, and insured. Our insurance covers your belongings during the entire moving process, giving you peace of mind.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept all major credit cards, cash, and bank transfers. Payment is typically due upon completion of the move, though we may require a deposit for large moves.

faq.question: Do you offer storage solutions?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer both short-term and long-term storage solutions. Our climate-controlled facilities are secure and accessible 24/7 for your convenience.

businessHours.title: Business Hours
businessHours.description: Our customer service team is available to help you during these hours:
businessHours.emergency: For emergency moves outside business hours, call our 24/7 emergency line: +1 (714) 555-0124
